name: Basketball Superstar
description:
Can you become the best basketball player in the world?

Basketball Superstar focuses on character development rather than quick reflexes. You start the game as at 18 year old free agent and play until you retire. What happens in-between is up to you!

IMPROVE YOUR ABILITIES
As you gain experience, you can upgrade abilities that suit your playing style. Perhaps you focus on becoming an all-out attacker with amazing shot-making skills or maybe you improve the metal side you your game so that you keep a cool head when the pressure is on?

CONTROL YOUR DESTINY
As your reputation improves, you will gain the attention of bigger and better teams. Do you stay loyal to your current team or move on? Do you move for money or sign for your favourite team? Are you ready to make the jump to the professional game? It’s up to you...

PLAYER CONTRACTS
Negotiate contracts to ensure you get the deal you deserve! Perhaps you add a bonus for reaching the play-offs or for becoming the team MVP? You need to make sure you get the deal you want, after all, if you are good at something never do it for free!

HELP IS AT HAND
One thing is for sure, you’ll need help. Hire agents, coaches, stylist and various other people to help you become more than just a player. After all, there's endorsement deals awaiting the right player!

ARE YOU THE BEST
From over 10,000 players, you can see your progression from rookie all the way to veteran. Can you reach the top and become the All-Star MVP?

Prove it…
